text: Snog Marry Avoid? is a British reality TV show. The first four series were hosted by Jenny Frost. From the fifth series Ellie Taylor has presented it. Its format is related to the fashion industry. It is shown on BBC Three. It was shown from 2008-2013. It stars POD (The "Personal Overhaul Device") who gives make-unders to people to try to show their natural beauty without makeup or fake tan. == Other websites == * Category:2008 British television series debuts Category:2000s British television series Category:2000s reality television series Category:2010s British television series Category:2010s reality television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British reality television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Snog Marry Avoid?
